exp:rd_critical_css.documentation: Inlines critical css files and provides polyfill support for 'rel=preload'.

critical.documentation: The path to the critical css file you want inlined in your document 'head'.

styles.documentation: The path(s) to stylesheet(s) to load via 'link' elements with 'rel=preload'.

external_fonts.documentation: The path to any external font stylesheet(s), also inlined in your document 'head'.
